Title: IconURL
Recommendation: Add an icon URL to make your module visually identifiable in the PowerShell Gallery

Title: ProjectUrl
Recommendation: Provide a project URL for users to access the source code, documentation, or further details about your module.

Title: LicenseUrl
Recommendation: Include a license URL to clearly communicate the terms of use for your module and  make it easier for other people to contribute.

Title: Description
Recommendation: Expand the description to give users a better understanding of what your module does.

Title: ReleaseNotes
Recommendation: Add release notes to inform users of changes, fixes, or improvements in each version.

Title: TagsCount
Recommendation: Add more relevant tags to improve your module's discoverability in search results.

Title: ItemType
Recommendation: Ensure your item type is set as "Module" to accurately categorize it within the PowerShell Gallery.

Title: OwnerCount
Recommendation: Invite additional owners to your module to share responsibility and improve collaboration.

Title: MultipleVersions
Description: Module has more than one version published
Recommendation: Publish multiple versions to demonstrate ongoing development and support for your module.

Title: DownloadCount
Recommendation: Promote your module to reach over 500 downloads, enhancing its visibility and credibility in the community.
